column4: I'm on wireless in ubuntu and I can surf through firefox, but empathy and evolution only can go online through the ethernet. If I am on wireless they don't connect. Anyone got any ideas?
are you on your home network or on a corporate / school network?
might be the case that only 80 works. but I damn will want to be sure that my wireless is functioning properly.
- check another network, such as starbucks and see.
